title.description: The game title that will be shown to players

author.description: The author name that will be shown to players

description.description: The long-form game description that will be shown to players

website.description: A web URL that will be shown to players

markdown.description: List of files and/or folders where Markdown source files reside. These are compiled in the order in which they appear. Folders are searched recursively for files with a .md extension.

javascript.description: List of files and/or folders where Javascript files reside. These are imported in the order in which they appear. Folders are searched recursively for files with a .js extension.

assets.description: List of files and/or folders where additional asset files reside. These are imported in the order in which they appear. Folders are searched recursively for all files.

template.description: The HTML template file to use for the final story output

output.description: The folder where the final story files will be saved

dryRun.description: If true, report all build steps as normal but don't actually modify any files on disk

minify.description: If true, minify the final story HTML (reduces file size but makes the HTML source much less human-readable)
